name: Gunther's Day
description: After a long week at work, Dad wants nothing more than to spend his Sunday relaxing.  He realizes too late that this Sunday is Easter and he has nothing planned for Gunther.  At the last minute Dad manages to throw something together to keep Gunther busy while he tries to enjoy his Sunday.  Play as Gunther and run around your house collecting Easter eggs, and maybe mess with your dad along the way.  Enjoy several mini-games, secrets and references.
